Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace CardGames.Core.Contracts

Interfaces

ICard

Represents the base interface of all cards.

ICardTray<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

A Representation of the tray where players put their cards.

ICardTraySlot<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the cards tray slot interface.

IDeck<TCard>

Represents the deck of cards interface.

IGame<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the game interface.

IMoveController<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the player move logic interface. This interface will hold the logic of the player actions when his turn comes.

IPlayer<TDeck, TCard>

Represents the player interface.

IRound<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the round interface. This interface will only represent the base round logic, that is specific to the game.

IRoundIteration<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the interface of the round iteration. This interface will define the detailed round logic which is specific to the game.

IShuffleable

Represents the interface of an object that supports shuffling.
